*Complete this quiz by checking one answer per question.*

1. Just about anything a user does on a page raises an event

- [ ] true
- [ ] false

2. Common events include
   
- [ ] click_event
- [ ] select_event
- [ ] input_event
- [ ] all of these

3. You can use anonymous functions to create event handlers

- [ ] true
- [ ] false
